oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Adkinson, William J., 1856 April 28
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of William J. Adkinson, dated April 28th, 1856. Illustrates the first page of the document. Adkinson’s will was recorded for probate to the Davidson County Court in “Book 17, page 259 &.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adkinson family
